ims.tuwien.ac.at.battleground.game.entity.building

Class TowerGun

  • java.lang.Object
    • ims.tuwien.ac.at.battleground.game.entity.DrawableObject
      • ims.tuwien.ac.at.battleground.game.entity.building.TowerGun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlakTowerGun, RocketTowerGun, TurretGun

    public abstract class TowerGun
extends DrawableObject
    This class acts as the superclass for all gun implementations of buildings in the application. It handles firing rate, damage, range...
    Author:
    schueller

      • update

        public void update(float tpf)
        Updates the current object. This method increases the internal reloadCounter and checks if an enemy is in range and can be shot at.
        Specified by:
        update in class DrawableObject
        Parameters:
        tpf - The timePerFrame that has passed

        public boolean isEnemyInRange(Enemy enemy)
        Checks wether a given Enemy is in range and can be shot at or not
        Parameters:
        enemy - The enemy that should be checked
        Returns:
        true if the enemy is in range, false otherwise

      • shootEnemy

        public abstract void shootEnemy(Enemy enemy)
        Checks whether an is in range or not. If the is in range the tower fires a bullet.
        Parameters:
        enemy - The enemy to be checked
